headline.print_headline: Officer on Leave After Tweets Threaten Protesters
headline.main: Officer on Leave After Tweets Threaten Protesters

lead_paragraph: A Northern California police department put one of its officers on leave Monday and is investigating threatening comments from his Twitter account about demonstrators who have participated in protests over the recent deaths of unarmed black men in Ferguson, Missouri and New York.
